feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-11-18T00:14:07.103050Z; ; ; <作者>; <名称>;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;OpenAI 董事会解雇了 Sam Altman</stitle>; <id>;https://openai.com/blog/openai-announces-leadership-transition</id>; <updated>;2023- 11-17T21:13:45.080562Z</updated>; <link href="https://openai.com/blog/openai-announces-leadership-transition"/>; <作者>; <name>;davidbarker</name>; <uri >;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=davidbarker</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://images.openai.com/blob/9eb94b23 -a383-4771-884f-cc1d88e296bd/brand-guidelines.png?trim=0%2C0%2C0%2C0&width=1000&quality=80" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;在 Sam Altman 离职后，OpenAI 首席技术官 Mira Murati 被任命为临时首席执行官。董事会认为，米拉的经验和对公司的了解使她非常适合担任这一职位。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#openai-s-board-has-fired-sam-altman" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38309611" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;OpenAI 解雇首席执行官 Sam Altman 令微软措手不及</stitle>; <id>;https://www.axios.com/2023/11/17/microsoft- openai-sam-altman-ouster</id>; <更新>;2023-11-17T23:44:45.082742Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.axios.com/2023/11/17/microsoft -openai-sam-altman-ouster"/>; <作者>; <名称>;aaronds</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=aaronds</uri>; </作者>; <内容type="html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#microsoft-was-blindside-by-openai-s-ouster-of-ceo-sam-altman" target="_blank">; [摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38312372" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; < Entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;电动汽车电池价格下降速度快于预期</stitle>; <id>;https://www .goldmansachs.com/intelligence/pages/electric-vehicle-battery-prices-falling.html</id>; <更新>;2023-11-17T15:13:45.083183Z</更新>; <link href="https:// www.goldmansachs.com/intelligence/pages/electric-vehicle-battery-prices-falling.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;dakna</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user? id=dakna</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.goldmansachs.com/intelligence/pages/electric-vehicle-battery-prices-falling-f/ 800x450.png" style="宽度: 220px;高度：124px;" />;<br />;到 2025 年，电动汽车 (EV) 的电池价格预计将降至每千瓦时 (kWh) 99 美元，较 2022 年下降 40%。这一下降是由于锂、镍和钴等电动汽车原材料的价格下降。随着电池价格下降，电动汽车市场可能会在本世纪中期实现与内燃机 (ICE) 汽车的成本平价。<a href="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/#electric-vehicle-battery-prices-are-falling-faster-than-expected" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator .com/item?id=38304405" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml ">; <title type="text">;Xash3D：半条命的开源重新实现</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/FWGS/xash3d-fwgs</id>; <更新>;2023- 11-17T21:13:45.083593Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/FWGS/xash3d-fwgs"/>; <author>; <name>;mepian</name>; <uri>;https:// /news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mepian</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/FWGS/xash3d-fwgs/master /game_launch/icon-xash-material.png" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;Xash3D FWGS 是一个游戏引擎，旨在提供与 Half-Life 引擎的兼容性并对其进行扩展。它是由 Unkle Mike 对原始 Xash3D 引擎进行重大修改的分支。<a href ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#xash3d-an-open-source-reimplementation-of-half-life" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// /news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38309970" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io /feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：nbi.ai – 生成式商业智能</stitle>; <id>;https://www.narrative.bi/ai</id>; <更新>;2023 -11-17T22:13:45.084010Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.narrative.bi/ai"/>; <作者>; <name>;fromthegut</name>; <uri>;https:// news.ycombinator.com/user?id=fromthegut</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://assets-global.website-files.com/5edf3eeece4c854c7119209b/6486d86e1b809d25781d58bd_ai-英雄插图.png" style="width: 220px; height: 277px;" />;<br />;Narrative 提供了一种从 Google Analytics 和其他工具获取最重要指标的方法，让代表客户更轻松地做出日常决策。Narrative 中的浓缩见解非常有用，现在在我们的日常工具组合中不可或缺。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-nbi-ai-generative-business-intelligence" target="_blank">;[summary]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38310502" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;一款关于凝视陌生人眼睛的游戏</stitle>; <id>;https://stranger.video/</ id>; <更新>;2023-11-17T17:13:45.084409Z</更新>; <link href="https://stranger.video/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;underanalyzer</名称>; <uri>;https ://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=underanalyzer</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://stranger.video/static/social1200x630.png" 样式=“宽度：220px；高度：116px;" />;<br />;这个网站可以让你和陌生人看到彼此的脸。它没有做太多其他事情。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat. io/#a-game-about-staring-into-the-eyes-of-a-stranger" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com /item?id=38305787" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;撇号保护协会</stitle>; <id>;https://www.apostrope.org.uk</id>; <更新>;2023-11-17T18:13:45.084837Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.apostrope.org.uk"/>; <作者>; <name>;Tomte</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Tomte</ uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static.wixstatic.com/media/792392_a35853e0a3f941bb82356e7dfa8ac448~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_274,h_182,al_c,q_80,usm_0 .66_1.00_0.01,enc_auto/shutterstock_397584811_664736701792_JPG.jpg" style="宽度: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;撇号保护协会成立于 2001 年，旨在保护撇号的正确使用。在短暂关闭后，新主席鲍勃·麦卡尔登 (Bob McCalden) 重新启动了该协会，以继续其使命. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#apostrope-protection-society" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com /item?id=38306680" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;燃气轮机如何征服电力行业</stitle>; <id>;https://www.construction-physicals.com/p/how-the-gas-turbine-conquered-the< /id>; <更新>;2023-11-17T19:13:45.085225Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.construction-physicals.com/p/how-the-gas-turbine-conquered-the "/>; <作者>; <名称>;jseliger</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jseliger</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1344,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages %2Fa96fbbab-34e6-48cd-a978-efb5e7552d2d_590x284.png" style="宽度: 220px; height: 106px;" />;<br />;燃气轮机的部署时间比蒸汽轮机更长，但最终征服了电力行业。蒸汽轮机最初由于更高的效率和更低的回功比而更加成功，但压缩机技术的进步更高的工作温度使燃气轮机能够赶上并超越蒸汽轮机。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#how-the-gas-turbine-conquered-the-electric-power-industry"目标="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38307596" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;沃尔沃交付 74 吨电动卡车</stitle>; <id>;https: //www.volvotrucks.com/en-en/news-stories/press-releases/2023/jun/volvo-delivers-74-tonne-electric-truck.html</id>; <更新>;2023-11-17T13： 13:45.085619Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.volvotrucks.com/en-en/news-stories/press-releases/2023/jun/volvo-delivers-74-tonne-electric-truck .html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;clouddrover </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=clouddrover</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">; <img src="https://assets.volvo.com/is/image/VolvoInformationTechnologyAB/Volvo-High-Capacity-Transport-1?wid=1024" style="width: 220px;高度: 147px;" />;<br />;越来越多的运输商正在投资用于重型运输的电动卡车。瑞典哥德堡的 Mattson Åkeri 购买了三辆重型电动沃尔沃 FH 卡车，并正在集装箱运输中进行测试。这些卡车可以处理组合总重为 74 吨，采用绿色电力充电。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#volvo-delivers-74-tonne-electric-truck" target="_blank">;[summary ]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38302844" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;反混淆《战舰世界》的 Python 脚本</stitle>; <id>;https://landaire.net/world -of-warships-deobfuscation/</id>; <更新>;2023-11-17T18:13:45.086020Z</更新>; <link href="https://landaire.net/world-of-warships-deobfuscation/" />; <author>; <name>;lukastyrychtr</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=lukastyrychtr</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src =“https://landaire.net/processed_images/header.e36508feb1e669d9.png”样式=“宽度：220px； height: 220px;" />;<br />;文章讨论了《战舰世界》中游戏脚本反混淆的过程以及对代码进行逆向工程所面临的挑战。作者分享了自己用于反混淆的工具和技术，以及游戏开发者用来混淆代码的技巧。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#deobfuscating-world-of-warships-python-scripts" target="_blank">;[summary]</ a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38302033" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base= "https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Meta 增强现实软件主管辞职</stitle>; <id>;https://www.reuters.com/technology /metas-head-augmented-reality-software-stepping-down-2023-11-17/</id>; <更新>;2023-11-17T22:13:45.086781Z</更新>; <link href="https:// /www.reuters.com/technology/metas-head-augmented-reality-software-stepping-down-2023-11-17/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;JeremyNT</名称>; <uri>;https:// news.ycombinator.com/user?id=JeremyNT</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cloudfront-us-east-2.images.arcpublishing.com/路透社/TNXJBQAHB5OZRKQYCGC4UJQQO4.jpg" style="width: 220px;高度：146px;" />;<br />;Meta 的增强现实软件负责人周五向路透社表示，该公司的增强现实软件负责人即将卸任，这引发了对该公司为其计划中的 AR 眼镜开发定制操作系统的进展的质疑。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#meta-s-head-of-augmented-reality-software-stepping-down" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38311144" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;PCIe Coral TPU 终于可以在 Raspberry Pi 5 上运行</stitle>; <id>;https://www.jeffgeerling.com/blog/2023/ pcie-coral-tpu-finally-works-on-raspberry-pi-5</id>; <更新>;2023-11-17T20:13:45.087950Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.jeffgeerling .com/blog/2023/pcie-coral-tpu-finally-works-on-raspberry-pi-5"/>; <作者>; <名称>;mikece</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com /user?id=mikece</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.jeffgeerling.com/sites/default/files/images/google-coral-tpu -pcie-raspberry-pi-5.jpg" style="宽度: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;Coral.ai TPU 是用于机器视觉和音频处理等任务的 AI 加速器。Raspberry Pi 通常集成到小型机器人和物联网产品中，或用于使用 Frigate 分析实时视频源。直到今天，据我所知，没有人能够在 Raspberry Pi 上使用 PCI Express Coral TPU。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-pcie-coral-tpu-finally-works -on-raspberry-pi-5" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38308552" target="_blank">;[ comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;硅的状态和GPU 较差</stitle>; <id>;https://www.latent.space/p/semianalysis</id>; <updated>;2023-11-17T20:13:45.088336Z</updated>; <link href="https: //www.latent.space/p/semianalysis"/>; <author>; <name>;swyx</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=swyx</uri>; </author >; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_512,h_512,c_fill,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack- post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F13a77f44-8bed-44b5-bdfd-ff7e10826ed8_1400x1400.png" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;本文讨论了 GPU 供应状况以及下一代 AI 的 FLOPS 需求。还探讨了“GPU 匮乏”或“GPU 丰富”的概念及其含义不同的公司和个人。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-state-of-silicon-and-the-gpu-poors" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38309014" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;50 年后以太网仍然强劲</stitle>; <id>;https://spectrum.ieee.org/ethernet-ieee -milestone</id>; <更新>;2023-11-17T12:13:45.088742Z</更新>; <link href="https://spectrum.ieee.org/ethernet-ieee-milestone"/>; <作者>; <名称>;pseudolus</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pseudolus</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:// spectrum.ieee.org/media-library/close-up-of-ethernet-cable-with-clear-fibres-in-the-background.jpg?id=50494003&width=1200&height=900" style="width: 220px; height: 165px;" />;<br />;以太网是一种允许通过同轴电缆进行高速数据传输的网络技术，于 1973 年在 Xerox Palo Alto 研究中心开发出来。它已成为周围地区的标准有线局域网。世界各地，广泛应用于企业和家庭。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#ethernet-is-still-going-strong-after-50-years" target="_blank">;[summary ]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38302283" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：Beta 测试执行程序的交互式“Python 程序员”课程</stitle>; <id>;https: //www.executeprogram.com/courses/python-for-programmers</id>; <更新>;2023-11-17T16:13:45.089126Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.executeprogram.com /courses/python-for-programmers"/>; <作者>; <名称>;gary_bernhardt</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=gary_bernhardt</uri>; </作者>; <内容类型=“html”>;<img src=“https://www.executeprogram.com/images/twitter-card.png”风格=“宽度：220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;快速学习 JavaScript、TypeScript、SQL 和正则表达式等编程工具。带有真实代码示例的互动课程。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show -hn-beta-test-execute-program-s-interactive-python-for-programmers-course" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com /item?id=38295705" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Rocket v0.5：稳定，异步</stitle>; <id>;https://rocket.rs/v0.5/news/2023-11-17-version-0.5/</id >; <更新>;2023-11-17T18:13:45.089511Z</更新>; <link href="https://rocket.rs/v0.5/news/2023-11-17-version-0.5/"/>; <author>; <name>;sbenitez</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=sbenitez</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Rocket v0.5 是经过四年的开发现已推出。它是一个 Rust 的异步后端 Web 框架，专注于可用性、安全性、可扩展性和速度。新版本引入了许多改进和功能。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#rocket-v0-5-stable-async" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=38306540​​" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;Sentry 再次重新获得许可 (FSL)</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.sentry.io/introducing-the-function-source-license-freedom-without-free-骑行/</id>; <更新>;2023-11-17T17:13:45.089896Z</更新>; <link href="https://blog.sentry.io/introducing-the-function-source-license-freedom- without-free-riding/"/>; <author>; <name>;aviks</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=aviks</uri>; </author>; <content type= "html">;<img src="https://images.ctfassets.net/em6l9zw4tzag/SudR9frnhwuJ6rkomJEx6/6428719564fe2631321e51be536e077d/Chad-Whitacre.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;Sentry 宣布他们将根据名为功能源许可证 (FSL) 的新许可证重新授权 Sentry 和 Codecov。 FSL 是商业源代码许可证 (BSL) 的演变，旨在平衡用户自由和开发人员可持续性。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#sentry-relicense-again-fsl" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator. com/item?id=38306320" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml" >; <title type="text">;《半条命》25 周年纪念更新</stitle>; <id>;https://www.half-life.com/en/halflife25/</id>; <更新>;2023-11-17T19 :13:45.090275Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.half-life.com/en/halflife25/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;Philpax</名称>; <uri>;https:// /news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Philpax</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.cloudflare.steamstatic.com/half-life.com /images/halflife25/gordon-bg.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：171px；" />;<br />;这个迷你活动最初以 CD 的形式专门为杂志和硬件制造商发行，是由 Half-Life 团队在游戏获得金牌后立即制作的。这些新地图由 Valve 关卡设计师打造，突破了 Half-Life 引擎的极限。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#half-life-25th-anniversary-update" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=38307889" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;使用 ClojureScript 方言 Squint 实现的弹球</stitle>; <id>;https://squint-cljs.github.io/squint/?src=https://gist.githubusercontent .com/borkdude/ca3af924dc2526f00361f28dcf5d0bfb/raw/09cd9e17bf0d6fa3655d0e7cbf2c878e19cb894f/pinball.cljs</id>;<更新>;2023-11-17T16：13：45.091045Z</更新>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38304661" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;2.8 亿辆电动自行车和轻便摩托车对石油需求的削减远远超过电动汽车</stitle>; <id>;https://theconversation.com/the-worlds- 2.8 亿辆电动自行车和轻便摩托车正在削减石油需求，远远超过电动汽车213870</id>; <更新>;2023-11-17T15:13:45.091421Z </更新>; <link href="https://theconversation.com/the-worlds-280-million-electric-bikes-and-mopeds-are-cutting-demand-for-oil-far-more-than-electric -cars-213870"/>; <作者>; <名称>;rglullis </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rglullis</uri>; </author>; <content type="html ">;<img src="https://images.theconversation.com/files/559537/original/file-20231115-25-497qt1.jpg?ixlib=rb-1.1.0&rect=14%2C0%2C2481%2C1661&q=20&auto =格式&w=320&fit=剪辑&dpr=2&usm=12&cs=条形" style="宽度：220px; height: 148px;" />;<br />;电动微型交通工具（例如电动自行车和轻便摩托车）所取代的石油需求量是全球电动汽车的四倍。电动轻便摩托车、踏板车、摩托车和摩托车的数量超过 2.8 亿辆去年，三轮汽车上路，使石油需求减少了世界石油总需求的约 1%。电动微型交通的购买和运行成本比电动汽车更便宜，使其成为短途旅行的可行替代方案。<a href=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/#280m-e-bikes-and-mopeds-are-cutting-demand-for-oil-far-more-than-electric-cars" target="_blank">;[摘要] </a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38304485" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml: base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Mirai 的自白：三个年轻黑客打造了一个网络杀手</stitle>; <id>;https:/ /www.wired.com/story/mirai-untold-story-third-young-hackers-web-killing-monster/</id>; <更新>;2023-11-17T21:13:45.091796Z</更新>; <链接href="https://www.wired.com/story/mirai-untold-story-third-young-hackers-web-killing-monster/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;uberm</名称>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=uberm</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://media.wired.com/photos/6553b2b6f64d15575999e6e8/主/w_2560%2Cc_limit/WIRED_Mirai_Opener_1_James-Junk-Matthew-Miller.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;2016 年 10 月，互联网经历了一次大规模停电，影响了主要网站和服务。耶鲁大学法学院教授斯科特·夏皮罗 (Scott Shapiro) 发现此次停电令人困惑，并开始调查原因。三名年轻黑客 Josiah White、Paras Jha 和 Dalton Norman 负责网络<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-mirai-confessions- Three-young-hackers-who- built-a-web-killing-monster" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38309424" target="_blank">; [comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;维基数据，包含 12B 事实，可以让法学硕士磨练以提高其真实性</stitle>; <id>;https://twitter.com/WikiResearch/status/1723966761962520824</id>; <updated>;2023-11-17T15:13:45.092182Z</updated>; < link href="https://twitter.com/WikiResearch/status/1723966761962520824"/>; <作者>; <name>;raybb</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=raybb< /uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;出了点问题，但别担心——让我们再试一次。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#wikidata-with-12b-facts-can-ground-llms-to-improve-their-factuality" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38304290" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;五角大楼连续第六年未通过审计</stitle>; <id>;https://breakingdefense.com/2023/11 /with-trillions-at-play-pentagon-fails-audit-for-sixth-year-in-a-row/</id>; <更新>;2023-11-17T17:13:45.092596Z</更新>; <link href="https://brokingdefense.com/2023/11/with-trillions-at-play-pentagon-fails-audit-for-sixth-year-in-a-row/"/>; <作者>; <名称>; TurkishPoptart</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=TurkishPoptart</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://sites. Breakingmedia.com/uploads/sites/3/2023/11/pentagon3-scaled.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 120px;" />;<br />;五角大楼连续第六年未能通过年度审计，同时声称已取得进展。此次审计检查了 29 个实体，其中只有 7 个实体获得了干净的审计。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#pentagon-fails-audit-for-sixth-year-in-a-row" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38306174" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;AIConfig – gen AI 提示、模型和设置的源代码控制格式</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/lastmile-ai /aiconfig</id>; <更新>;2023-11-17T17:13:45.092983Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/lastmile-ai/aiconfig"/>; <作者>; <名称>; saqadri</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=saqadri</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw. githubusercontent.com/lastmile-ai/aiconfig/main/aiconfig-docs/static/img/readme_logo.png" style="width: 220px; height: 115px;" />;<br />;AIConfig 是一种源代码控制格式，它将提示、模型和模型参数保存为配置。它将提示、模型参数和特定于模型的逻辑与应用程序代码分开，从而更容易单独迭代它们。它支持提示链接、参数化和流式传输，并提供类似笔记本的编辑器进行可视化编辑。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#aiconfig-source-control-format-for-gen-ai-prompts-models-and-settings" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38306410" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;递归序列的惊人行为</stitle>; <id>;https://www.quantamagazine.org/the-astonishing- behavior-of-recursive-sequences-20231116/</id>; <更新>;2023-11-17T12:13:45.093369Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.quantamagazine.org/the-astonishing- behavior-of-recursive-sequences-20231116/"/>; <author>; <name>;pseudolus</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pseudolus</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://d2r55xnwy6nx47.cloudfront.net/uploads/2023/11/WeirdSequences-byKristinaArmitage-Lede-scaled.webp" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px； ” />;<br />;斐波那契数列，一个简单的数列，在数学的各个领域都具有深远的意义。同样，由递归公式定义的 Somos 序列表现出违反直觉的行为，并且与不同的数学分支有联系。另一种类型的序列，称为戈贝尔序列，也显示出令人惊讶的整数项模式。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-astonishing-behavior-of-recursive-sequences" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38302288" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Bitwarden 在 Linux OpenSuse 下出现黑屏</stitle>; <id>;https://community.bitwarden.com/t/bitwarden-is-down-with-blank -screen-under-linux-opensuse/58751</id>; <更新>;2023-11-17T19:13:45.093745Z</更新>; <link href="https://community.bitwarden.com/t/bitwarden- is-down-with-blank-screen-under-linux-opensuse/58751"/>; <作者>; <名称>;mikae1</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mikae1< /uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://community.bitwarden.com/uploads/default/optimized/3X/6/9/6928c8cf53f5ebe98b1cab9eb3f11c6f49ab3df3_2_1024x718.jpeg" style="width ：220px；高度：155px；” />;<br />;当我启动 Bitwarden 桌面时，我看到一个空白屏幕，所以这对我来说是一个很大的问题。这是由于最近的 Bitwarden 更新还是我的 Linux 造成的？您有任何反馈或解决方案吗？我还在 OpenSuse 论坛上发布了一条消息，但它可能特定于 Bitwarden，这证明了我认为重复的合理性。想法？ <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#bitwarden-is-down-with-blank-screen-under-linux-opensuse" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38308408" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
